full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 44 of 261 1184
LC6Cmax1 Kate - direct
1 MS. STERNHEIM: Objection. Leading.
2 THE COURT: I'll allow it. You may answer.
3 A. Could you repeat the question, please.
4 Q. What, if anything, did Maxwell say about Epstein's need for massages?
5 A. She said that he needed massages all the time and it was very difficult to keep up.
6 Q. Where did you and Maxwell go after that conversation?
7 A. She led me up the stairs and opened the door to a room that had a massage table in it.
8 (Continued on next page)
9 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
10 DOJ-OGR-00018381
